verses.verse: "At that time, {Lit. day} seven women will cling tightly to one man and will make him this offer: {Lit. will say} «We'll provide {Lit. eat} our own bread. We'll provide our own clothes. Just let us marry you {Lit. let your name be upon us} so we won't be stigmatized anymore.»" {I. e. by appearing to be part of a family}

{The Future Glory of Jerusalem} d "At that time, {Lit. In that day} the Lord's branch will be beautiful and glorious, and the fruit of the land will be the pride and glory of the survivors of Israel and Judah. {So 1QIsa a ; MT LXX lack and Judah}
Whoever {Lit. It will come about that whoever} survives in Zion and whoever remains in Jerusalem will be called holy everyone who has been appointed to survive in Jerusalem

when the Lord will have washed away the filth of the women {Lit. daughters} of Zion, cleaning up Jerusalem's guilt {Lit. blood ; i. e. guilt incurred by shedding innocent blood} by a spirit of judgment and a spirit of tempest. {So 1QIsa a ; MT reads of burning}

Then the Lord will create over the entire site of Mount Zion including over those who assemble there a cloud by day {So 1QIsa a ; MT LXX reads day, accompanied by smoke, as well as the brilliance of a flaming fire by night, because over the entire glorious area there will be a canopy and 6 a shelter to protect from the heat of the day, and}
and also to serve as a refuge and shelter from storms and rain."
